parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the returned entries. Valid values:

*   DESC: the descending order
*   ASC: the ascending order

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description: The end time in the yyyy-MM-dd format, for example, 2023-03-13.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword. The Keyword parameter is used together with the SearchMode parameter.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language. Valid values: zh, en, and ja.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: SearchMode
parameters.description:
The search mode of the keyword. Valid values:

*   LIKE (default): fuzzy search
*   EXACT: exact search

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: The start time in the yyyy-MM-dd format, for example, 2023-03-01.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description:
The threshold for the number of Domain Name System (DNS) requests. You can query the domain names at the specified quantity level of DNS requests and query the number of DNS requests for each domain name.

If you do not specify this parameter, the data about the domain names that have DNS requests is obtained.

If you set this parameter to a value less than 0, the data about all domain names is obtained.

If you set this parameter to 0, the data about the domain names that do not have DNS requests is obtained.

If you set this parameter to a value greater than 0, the data about the domain names whose number of DNS requests is less than or equal to the value of this parameter is obtained.
